comment: Nothing beats a proper, good ol' country-rock duet. This sounds like it could have been written at any point in the last 50 years, yet somehow feels like a breath of fresh air. Wonderful.

This song is sublime and an instant classic.  I have always thought their voices are absolutely beautiful, and hearing them in a duet is what I needed today. Beyonce and Miley have the extraordinary ability to make you feel like they're telling your story. Kudos to both for a job well done.
